title: The Crypt of the Serpent King
description: You and your companions have been tasked with exploring a forgotten crypt said to hold the tomb of an ancient king and a powerful artifact. But beware, the crypt is guarded by a slithering monstrosity.

title: Escape from the Sky Fortress
description: Your team has been captured and imprisoned aboard a floating fortress in the clouds. With a massive storm approaching, you must work together to find an escape route before the fortress is destroyed.

title: Mystery on the Starship Voyager
description: A mysterious signal has drawn your starship to a derelict vessel. As you board to investigate, you find the crew missing and the ship's systems in disarray. Can you uncover the truth before it's too late?
